title: Game didn't reward anything or show in match history
body:
As the title says, the other night I played a Sivir game in ranked and we ending up winning, the results screen comes up and it asked me to either wait or skip, me being inpatient I skip the results and try to enter another game and it says that I'm already in a game, I take a quick look at my history and LP and they are like the game never happened. Thinking it was just the servers not responding I try to relog, as I log back in it says reconnect only to have a black screen or as some would call it a "ghost game". I wait an hour and still nothing, at this stage it was late at night so I decided to just go to bed and fix it in the morning. I managed to get on and play but the Sivir game that I played still didn't contribute to my LP or match history. 

I'm not asking for much just want to know what happened and if it's an issue on my end or Riots? 乁( ͠°_ °)ㄏ
Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sometimes this can occur if there are server sided issues at the time of the game, the match will not properly be recorded and any LP gains/losses will not be applied.

Sometimes the match does eventually appear, however this usually happens within 48 hours. If this match has not appeared then it is unfortunately lost, gone with the wind.

Sorry about that.
